mapper.select: select * from tbl_qna where id = #{id} and qna_status = 'published'
select q.*, count(l.id) as qna_like_count from tbl_qna q left join tbl_qna_likes l on q.id = l.qna_id where q.qna_status = 'published' group by q.id order by q.id desc limit #{count} offset #{offset}
select count(*) from tbl_qna where qna_status = 'published'
mapper.update: update tbl_qna set qna_view_count = qna_view_count + 1 where id = #{id}
update tbl_qna set qna_status = 'deleted' where id = #{id}
update tbl_qna set qna_file_id = #{fileId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id as corpId, corp_company_name as corpName from tbl_corp where corp_company_name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') order by corp_company_name limit 20
